author: Cayetano Ferre
description: Sweet aniseed may not sound appealing but you should try an Absinthe Frappé after a large meal on a summer's night before you decide on this delicious cocktail.
name: Absinthe Frappé
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) and serve with a straw
